summary: American Indian and Alaska Native students enrolled in public schools have consistently performed below other students on national tests. The Bureau of Indian Education’s Johnson-O’Malley program provides these students with academic support and enrichment activities, such as Native language classes. The Bureau needs to improve how it manages the program by: having key information such as an accurate list of contractors providing services providing training...
title: Bureau of Indian Education: Actions Needed to Improve Management of a Supplemental Education Program
